requester_id.description: Unique identifier for the survivor requesting the resource.

provider_id.description: Unique identifier for the volunteer providing the resource.

request_date.description: Timestamp when the resource was requested.

delivery_date.description: Timestamp when the resource is expected to be delivered or was delivered.

priority.description: Priority of the allocation, based on factors such as need and last fulfillment time.

contact_info.description: Encrypted contact information of the requester.
